channel.title: xxDestructionxx|first release|a remake|sum|dung|what a server is supposed to be
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/289yhky.png[/img][/center] [center]hey guys welcome to my first ever release [code]woot woot :)[/code] NOTE: this is a remake of Downscape! but highly edited!
sooo... LETS BEGIN![/center] [b][center]Jad is now more pain in the balls lol :D naw just kiddin same old PI :) works 100% added easter ring 100% working with the transfomation into egg and untransofmation 0 bugs! added 100% working Dungeoneering skill cape emote all chaotics with the 100% correct anim and effects! Chaotic Crossbow boosted ;) hand cannon special tweeked (hand cannon glitch 100% working ;) ) all primal gear and all of the dungeoneering armor weapons, and necklasses 100% moved dungeoneering portal and added a bit of a twist on that same old home, im not gonna spoon feed you new home locations. private chats,friends logs,ignore list, and clan system 100% now with 0 bugs! added ring of Kindship to teleport you to Dungeoneering portal! worked on curses and there up to date with Runescape BRAND NEW teleporting gfx and anims ( ill show in pic below) ( modern spell book ) added shortcut commands like ::home, ::corp, ::train, several other more!! FunPK for those who are new to pking ( good place to start training ) added switching commands (:: 8 = 8 way switches, 4 = 4 way switches -> staff only) added tones of interfaces (::commands, ::players, ::news) added spirit shield effects for Divine and Ely 100%! new login gameframe ( show in pic ) added new training area! ( ::train2 -> your familiars can now aid you in battle!) raised the charm droppings instead of the shit old 1 :D added over 35+ commands.. probebly more.. modern prayers all have working effects like RS added face north ( when you click on compass brings you to the north side JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE!! added probebly status for Pernix ( original copy had 0 stats for the entire set when you wear them...) warriors guild has been bit tweeked :) when teleporting to Corperal Beast t sends you a lil Tip! moved the Holy Elixir crystal to the side of corp (do ::corp and it'll tell you where) all Bolt effects ( diamond, dragon,etc..! ) added ::monkeyhome ( brings you to Ape Atoll, you can finish it yourself ;) ) added ::mining for a place to mine ofc lol brand new locations for all the alters! ::startdung added 100% working now! ( gives you the Kinship ring, and a lil tip! ) added ::highpk ( for level 47 wildy pking ) same Dungeoneering system -> [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MtAd_Ix4OCU]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MtAd_Ix4OCU[/url] ( the original copy ) creating of the spirit shields are now working! all the familiars will aid you in Multi areas only! DFS is now 100% get charges from Dragon Breathes! soulsplit is 100%, and the other curses lightning fast hybriding switches! ( i couldn't belive how fast it was 0% lag! ) staff of light 100% special with actual effect fixed over 15 different types of dupings :D quikchat for all the stats you can possibly train! even the voting level! 138 combat now is perfected just liek runescape has soo much more :D[/center]
[center][b] time for pics :D[/b][/center]
[center][img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-P64NO3idvik/TdbpdQWR67I/AAAAAAAAACo/ciH8FJ_33pk/rush.gif[/img] [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-G9-p32uhM3M/TdUJbQKRwJI/AAAAAAAAADs/L4z9_KeKZss/Untitled.gif[/img] [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-F1HIacItP8s/TdT70KPXe4I/AAAAAAAAADU/4tx_wcf47VY/shields.gif[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/taq7eu.png[/img] [img]http://card-scape.com/pictures/dung.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2rhu4pf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2nc4489.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/116i97a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/4fv49u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/260bdr7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/1693n6x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/e9hdn9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/20pabc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/28w2wzl.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/30lo489.gif[/img][/center] [center][b]LOGIN FRAME![/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/auzb6g.png[/img][/center] [center][b] HOPE YOU GYS ENJOYED MY HARD WORK ON DOWNSCAPE! NOW HERE IS THE SOURCE AND CLIENT LINK![/b][/center] SOURCE -> [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DD2NCCQW]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DD2NCCQW[/url] CLIENT -> EDIT #1 [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=NTPPGEEZ]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=NTPPGEEZ[/url] EDIT #2 ( second download link coming soon ) Credits - Owner Den ( xxifish i x -me) ~ 50% justhin10 ~ 45% [b]for source base[/b] Hybrid Pvp ~ 5% for client!

1 word…sexy

[/quote]

it’s a teamtorva and downscape leech bro.
